# Rule-ROM: Global Registry of Executable Intentions ğŸ“œğŸ›¡ï¸

**We translate AI from the realm of probabilities to the realm of executable Intent.**

## ğŸ›ï¸ About

**Rule-ROM** is an expandable federation of technical standards. We create a universal control bus â€” from C source code to neuromorphic silicon and industrial automation. Any technology where "best practices" and safety rules can be formalized can be integrated into the Registry.

**Mission:** Deterministic barrier that transforms stochastic noise of neural networks into verifiable results.

## ğŸŒ Federation Domains

| Domain | Purpose | URL |
|--------|---------|-----|
| ğŸŒ¿ **C-SAFE** | Legacy Immunization: Clang AST + Garden-Core | https://c-safe.rulerom.com |
| ğŸ§  **Decima** | Neuromorphic substrate and bus specifications | https://decima.rulerom.com |
| ğŸ§ª **Bakery** | Methodology for "baking" deterministic personalities | https://bakery.rulerom.com |
| ğŸ”ˆ **Audrey** | Vacuum electronics standards and frequency physics | https://audrey.rulerom.com |

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Enforcement Protocol: Zero-Trust

| Aspect | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| **Verification** | Babashka (Clojure) validation of Clang Abstract Syntax Tree |
| **Law** | If `AST != Intent`, code is **pruned** (rejected) |
| **Efficiency** | 20Âµs - 40Âµs on i5-3550 |

## ğŸ“‹ Core Principles

| Principle | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| **Intent is Primary** | Code without Intent in Registry is noise |
| **Vacuum Isolation** | AI agents through intentional gateway only |
| **Substrate Sovereignty** | Rules execute identically in emulator, C, and silicon |
| **Hierarchy of Responsibility** | 16 Elders hold balance, 256 Nodes ensure coverage |

| Year | Link |

```markdown
## 2026-02-27

- Created log structure by year/month
- Added trilingual support (en/ru/zh)
```

## ğŸ”„ Intent Lifecycle

```
Human Intent â†’ EDN Contract â†’ Bake Blob â†’ EV_BAKE â†’ Swarm Execute
```

| Stage | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| **Human Intent** | Architect formulates task |
| **EDN Contract** | Machine-readable contract |
| **Bake Blob** | Binary TLV format |
| **EV_BAKE** | Fix configuration |
| **Swarm Execute** | Deterministic execution |

## ğŸ› ï¸ Quick Start

### Run Documentation

```bash
# English version
cd en
mkdocs serve

# Russian version
cd ru
mkdocs serve

# Chinese version
cd zh
mkdocs serve
```

### Build All Versions

```bash
cd en && mkdocs build --clean
cd ../ru && mkdocs build --clean
cd ../zh && mkdocs build --clean
```

## ğŸ’° Support Tiers

| Tier | Price | Access |
|------|-------|--------|
| **Observer** | Free | Public docs |
| **Gardener** | $4.50/mo | Dev-logs |

| **Swarm Founder** | $170/mo | Emulator + API |
| **Swarm Node** | $1,130/mo | ASIC/FPGA specs |
